text:
The final day of Orient City's big summer event,
"Hero City Summer Festa"-

name: Sterio
text:
Awooo~!
This waterslide is
so much fun~!!

In a corner of the beach area,
a beastman alien boy
was playing innocently at an attraction.

options.text: Is it okay for you to have your clothes on?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's fine, fine, I can swim just fine in these clothes!
I properly put away my valuables!

name: Sterio
text:
[Player], thank you, thank you
for playing with me today!
I'm so happy!

name: Sterio
text:
I wanted to visit all the places
I haven't been to yet
before Hero Festa ends~

options.text: So you only got to play around on the first day?
Come to think of it, it was like a field trip, wasn't it?

name: Sterio
text:
That's right!
Work and study are important, but
after they're over, you need a break too!

name: Sterio
text:
[Player], you've been working super hard,
so today, let's play to our heart's content with me!

options.text: Can't be helped, I'll go along with it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really!?
Then you can ride on my back.
I'm good at swimming, so it's fine!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you don't like the sea, we can go to the beach or another place to play!
For example-

name: Sterio
text:
Attractions at the beach area~
food stalls~ tell me if there's any place
you want to go! Alright, let's go~!

[Player] is invited by Sterio
and explores various areas
of Hero Festa.

name: Sterio
text:
Watermelon smashing!?
Papa told me about that,
I want to try it!

name: Sterio
text:
Hum hum? Blindfolded~
spinning around~
......

name: Sterio
text:
Ugh~ I'm dizzy and
can't walk straight~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sniff sniff...
The sweet smell is getting closer, is it here?
Hyaah-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa~ I successfully split the watermelon in half!
[Player], let's eat together!

options.text: Smash it with all your might!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa!? I put too much strength into it, and the watermelon got all smashed~!
How do we eat this now?

name: Sterio
text:
Whoa~!
I'm running on the sea like Rokusei's Parallel Weapon,
that's amazing~!!

name: Sterio
text:
Swimming is fun too,
but this towing tube is fast,
and the wind feels really good!

options.text: Ahhhhhhhhhhh, a little too fast, maybe!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], if you're scared, hold on to me tighter!
I'll support you so you don't fall!

name: Sterio
text:
Munch munch munch munch...
Fried noodles, grilled squids, fried pancakes,
all delicious and I'm so happy~!

note:
(*) 焼きそば (yakisoba), イカ焼き (ikayaki), (お好み焼き) okonomiyaki respectively.
Though I do have to admit turning the 3rd one into
"fried pancakes" does sound kinda weird...

name: Sterio
text:
What should I eat next...? Hmm?
Look, look, [Player], over there
they're eating live fish!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so?
Ornamental fish?
They're certainly pretty colors, and I never get tired of watching them!

options.text: I see, he doesn't know about goldfish scooping.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Stall Owner
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is no time to be admiring, you there!
...This is a goldfish scooping stall, I'll explain it to you, so won't you come play?

text:
Having thoroughly enjoyed all the attractions in the venue,
[Player] and Sterio returned to the beach area.

name: Sterio
text:
Phew~.
I played so much,
I'm very satisfied~!

name: Sterio
text:
How about you, [Player]?
Did you have fun?
Did you get to relax?

options.text: I played too much and I'm tired...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know~!
Sometimes after playing a lot, I get exhausted and just fall asleep~!

text:
With an innocent smile towards [Player],
Sterio wags his big tail excitedly.

name: Sterio
text:
I like the sea of Muirauka IV,
but I've come to like Earth
just as much because it's so much fun.

name: Sterio
text:
Tomorrow is the day we go home, but
I still haven't played enough,
and I want to come to Earth again someday.

name: Sterio
text:
By the way, [Player],
have you ever been to
anywhere in Muirauka I through VI?

options.text: I've been to III and IV!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really!?
Did you go for hero work?
I want to take on that kind of work too!

options.text: I think I went to some of them.

name: Sterio
text:
If [Player] ever comes to
anywhere in Muirauka, tell me!
If I know the place, I'll guide you!

name: Sterio
text:
I want to play with you again on any planet.
I'm super happy when I'm with you, [Player]!

With an innocent smile,
Sterio proposes to [Player]
what he had just thought of.

name: Sterio
text:
Oh! That's right, I thought of something good.
[Player], next time, come to my house,
and I'll introduce you to Papa and Mama~!

name: Sterio
text:
[Player], you helped Canes and me transform,
and helped us so much at Hero Festa,
you're our benefactor!

name: Sterio
text:
Giving proper thanks to people you're indebted to
is very important as an adult.
I know that!

options.text: Thank you, I'll plan it next time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa~ I did it~!
Oh, but no rush at all,
hero work seems busy!

options.text: Is it still a bit too early?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa~!?
Then, then, when would be a good time?
After I start hero work, maybe?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Okay~!? Understood~!
I'll work hard at both hunting and hero work
and earn money for the trip~!

name: Sterio
text:
I'll be looking forward to the day
I can see [Player] again, always!
Promise, promise.

name: Sterio
text:
I talked to various people at this Hero Festa,
and I'm a little less scared
of being separated from Canes.

name: Sterio
text:
Even if we part, there's the joy of meeting again next time.
Even if we can't meet, we have memories.
It's the same whether I have a role or not.

Sterio, who had mostly only focused on his family,
experienced several days that were-
stimulating, shocking, fascinating, and irreplaceable.

name: Sterio
text:
I won't forget everyone.
President, Justice, and also,
Mighty Knuckle and Naruhito and-

name: Sterio
text:
Hero teachers, Pirate Captain,
Goro, Gen-jiji, Pubraseer.
Loren, Rakta-sensei... everyone, everyone.

name: Sterio
text:
Everyone I met with Canes, Rokusei, and you, [Player].
All of them are my precious memories.

Sterio looks up at the sky,
recalling the people he met on a distant planet.
Numerous unfamiliar stars floated in the night sky.

name: Sterio
text:
It's beautiful~!
It's completely different from the sky on Muirauka I,
but it's sparkling just the same!

name: Sterio
text:
......
Hey, [Player]. Can you
see Muirauka I from Earth?

options.text: You can't see it from here.
I wonder if you can see it through a telescope...?

text:
Sterio hears [Player]'s
reply and understands intuitively.

That Earth and his homeland were
so, so far apart.
-Even if it were easy to travel by spaceship.

options.text: I'll walk you to your inn.
The wind's gotten cold, hasn't it?

text:
Saying that, Sterio gently holds
[Player]'s hand, who is about to head
towards the Hero Festa exit, and stops them.

name: Sterio
text:
[Player]... please.
Just a little more, I want to stay together.

name: Sterio
text:
Tomorrow, I'm going back to Muirauka I.
I know that-
but I want to stay in "today" a little longer...

Even knowing it would be even harder later,
Sterio imprints the warmth of the person
he feels now into his memory.

So that he can remember his precious Earth companions,
no matter how far away
the chance to meet again might be.

He wraps [Player] in his thick fur.
To ensure they never feel he coldness of the
lonely wind blowing on the sandy beach-
